description: Operators that buff allies' attack or attack speed. Note that buffing and debuffing operators fell off really hard because you can just have another DPS instead of a buffer for your DPS

aak: Hard to tank the buff for operators but if tanked is very good
nasti: Absurdly high damage buff for 1 ranged operator

warfarin: For one target applies a pretty hefty buff

pallas: Usefulness of buff hindered by high SP costs

heidi: At the price of -3 block for operators who receive this buff (which is a pretty hefty price)
spuria: The side effects of this buff is not worth it

swire: Buffs melee operators in surrounding tiles with bad uptime
